pullrequest.title: Enable on/off arguments for sensors xacro

content.raw:
This is currently just referenced as an example of a custom sensor layout in the tutorials. I suggest a new PR add a new file for the static sensor configuration to be used in VMRC, with some changes from this one:

‌

* remove the ground truth pose plugin
* Add 2 more cameras, so that there is a forward facing stereo pair and a mono camera facing right
* Remove the if/else flags \(all teams will use the same sensors\)
* Switch the lidar to a 3D lidar
* Use the “T” thruster configuration
content.html:
This is currently just referenced as an example of a custom sensor layout in the tutorials. I suggest a new PR add a new file for the static sensor configuration to be used in VMRC, with some changes from this one:

‌

  • remove the ground truth pose plugin
  • Add 2 more cameras, so that there is a forward facing stereo pair and a mono camera facing right
  • Remove the if/else flags (all teams will use the same sensors)
  • Switch the lidar to a 3D lidar
  • Use the “T” thruster configuration
